mapper.select: select school_id, school_name, province, case when nature = 36000 then '公办' when nature = 36001 then '民办' else '' end nature, f985, f211, case when dual_class = 38001 or dual_class = 38000 then '双一流' else '' end dual_class, eol_rank,badge_url from school_special ss left join school s on ss.school_id = s.id where special_id = #{id} ORDER BY eol_rank
